game.name: Flies.
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A house infested with rot. The smell of mold in the air. Why are you here? Who are you doing this for? Maybe with enough attempts you'll find the real answer. You just have to remember it. After all, you don't want to get swarmed by flies... Right?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A house infested with rot. The smell of mold in the air. Why are you here? Who are you doing this for? Maybe with enough attempts you'll find the real answer. You just have to remember it. After all, you don't want to get swarmed by flies... Right?
